chapter.para: Converting images from one format to another is generally straightforward.

section.title: List Volumes
section.para: The following program Lists the Volumes
section.programlisting:
import os from cinderclient.v2 import client from credentials import get_cinder_credentials
credentials = get_cinder_credentials() try: cinder_client = client.Client(*credentials, service_type="volume") vol_list = cinder_client.volumes.list() for v in vol_list: print v finally: print "Execution Completed"
